channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 21:59 Threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 21:59 Threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 21:42 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 21:42 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Surveat for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 21:42 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 21:42 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 21:40 Auxiliary in Kharkiv region. Please note that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 21:40 Auxiliary in Kharkiv region.
